PC v097 Patch Notes 

â€¢Roulette Exploit has been fixed
â€¢Fixed time trial glitch where the player could restart the race before the finish line to achieve a time of --:--:--
â€¢Resolved an issue where Cinematics in the Casino could cause a crash
â€¢Fixed a bug regarding the display of opponents' hands if they fold after the turn
â€¢Error messaging for Casino games has been improved. Now, if you attempt to join a game without being in a game session, you'll get a "No Session Available" message instead of "The Test Drive Unlimited 2 Server is Not Available"
â€¢Fixed a bug that could cause players to occasionally lose money at the Slot Machine
This has got to be one of the worse games EVER
Game is fine, when i first started i was this game is total shit. But when i went along with it it came better.

After installing this update and using the new crack, I can't play anymore. I use the automaticly created icon on my desktop. It says: "The Test Drive Unlimited 2 Server is Not Available"
What am I doing wrong?
I can't play anymore. I think the problem is my profile is an online profile since the update or something. How to change it to offline?

TO ANYONE WITH CONTROLLER PROBLEMS. i.e. Steering Wheels setup 

AT THE CONTROL SETUP SCREEN...

Unplug your keyboard - Click Detect Device (It'll still register a keyboard, this is okay) - then setup your controls - Plug the keyboard back in and play.
It still asks for online activation.  Is there a way around this?  I've added the uploader.exe to the firewall blocklist.  Any fixes?
I have a problem with the controls even though i changed them from the options menu they still are the same (default).
I have a PROBLEM when i launch the game and press play for the offline mode, a fullscreen launches and stays blank then it crashes.

{Controls Problem fixed}
It sometimes also shows the loading icon then crashes. I have tried reinstalling it and other cracks but kept on crashing.

I blocked the uplauncher in my firewall, and copied the crack to the game directory, but it still keeps updating the crack (testdrive2.exe)

what i've tried 2 :

First let update, then block in firewall, and then copy crack --> Same result..

what can / should i do?

obviously all the time skidrow and razor releases are perfect, but i think its the fault of TDU2

please help me, i just got my 911 Carrera wheel and want to test it out with TDU2...
Doesn't work for me, i deleted all files.
i have the update 2 and it works, did i have to update with this one too? don't know what to do.
Anybody know of a crack for the second DLC?
